fieldDescription: Target Repair Rate increase while mod is active. Multiplicative.
Target Supplies to Recover reduce while mod is active. Multiplicative.
Modifier applied to metals usage (meaning Used Commodity). Multiplicative.
Supplies base price divided by Used Commodity base price. Leave empty to calculate that for you.
Campaign days to trigger hullmod update. Math is adjusted to work correctly with any value, so this is mostly a minor performance optimization.
Is the mod safe to remove from the game. Unchecking this might improve game save times by a small margin.
